name: Heat Crash
effect:
If the target has used the move Minimize, this move is an automatic Critical Hit. This move adds Damage Dice the heavier the user is than the opponent.
> 10 kg/22 lbs: +1
> 25 kg/55 lbs: +2
> 50 kg/110 lbs: +3
> 100 kg/220 lbs: +4
> 200 kg/441 lbs: +5
description: The user slams the target with a body engulfed in flames.
